unnormalised: I started browsing on 28/10/2024, hoping to catch the early bird deals. Flipkart was showing a discount of 20% on a Samsung phone I had my eye on, originally priced at Rs. 25000. Sounded good, right? Then Amazon popped up with a similar model, but the discount was slightly lower at 15%, but they were offering an extra Rs. 500 off if you used an ICICI Bank card. My wife has one, so I figured, why not?

unnormalised: The problem started when I tried to check out. Flipkart kept showing me a delivery date of 05/11/2024, which was cutting it close to Diwali. So, I went with Amazon, placed the order for Rs. 21250 after discount, and felt pretty good about it.

unnormalised: Then, disaster struck! On 31/10/2024, I got a message saying the order was delayed. Apparently, there was some issue with their logistics partner in Gurgaon. I called their customer service, spent almost 30 mins on hold, only to be told they couldn't do anything. Finally, they gave me a Rs. 200 gift voucher for the inconvenience.

unnormalised: In the end, I had to cancel the order and go to a local store in Lajpat Nagar and buy a different phone. Paid Rs. 26000, no discount, but at least my dad had a new phone for Diwali. I think next time, I'll just stick to buying mithai online, those deliveries usually arrive on time.
